\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{filecontents}
\usepackage{graphicx}

\newcommand{\generateimage}[2]{%
\immediate\write18{convert.cmd #1 > #2}}

\begin{document}

\begin{filecontents*}{myfigure.txt}

\end{filecontents*}

Hello there.

\generateimage{myfigure.txt}{myfigure.png}
\includegraphics{myfigure.png}

\end{document}
